translations: 诱拐，绑架（kidnap 过去时形式）

sentences.sentence: It is feared (that) he may have been kidnapped.
sentences.translation: 人们担心他可能被绑架了。

sentences.sentence: Two businessmen have been kidnapped by terrorists.
sentences.translation: 两名商人遭恐怖分子绑架。

sentences.sentence: No sooner had he arrived in Rome than he was kidnapped.
sentences.translation: 他一抵达罗马就被绑架了。
